ygData.subject: Re: The old brass problem
ygData.msgSnippet: The reason no animation is seen is because you dont have a target, but that wont affect skill increase. If I remeber correctly I bought my horn in FP from the
ygData.messageBody:
The reason no animation is seen is because you dont have a target, but that
wont affect skill increase. If I remeber correctly I bought my horn in FP
from the bard guild. If for some reason they no longer sell it, Krap
Windbreaker...err Krak the aviak vendor sells them.
I do not know what the unfinished trumpet is for. I have seen it but have not
heard anyone say what it might be used for.
Anyways, g'luck to ya.

Ren
